days.text: Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 8 ~ 11 pm due to astronomical tide. Mainly fine. Haze during the day. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Haze during the day. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
